about_the_game:
Enter the world of Tenebyss, a dystopian gothic castles world that is flooded by

thick mist and clouds. A world where Dark Souls and Risk Of Rain meet each other

and create a unique experience.

- Flow Of Combat - 

Several kinds of weapons for you to choose, try and see what fits your play style best!

Each weapon has its own combo, abilities and even movement! Also, each weapon of the same kind will have different abilities and combos depending on its rarity and enchantment!
Feel free to change the weapons whenever you like!

Currently implemented weapon movements:

  • Dualswords (Heavy)

  • Great Sword (Light)

  • Magic Staff (Ranged)

  • More weapon kinds and movements are yet to come very soon!

- Inventory System - 

Easy to use inventory system to carry all items, found loot and crafting items!
(The UI is yet to be updated) 

- Dungeons To Explore -

In Tenebyss, you will have a huge number of dungeons to loot, explore, find secret areas and fight enemies and bosses. All of them are sorted by levels, get prepared before you head out to the next level dungeon! You will need to take care of your:

  • Skill Sets

  • Enhance your inventory items

  • Trade your current items for a better ones

  • Armor

Or maybe even sell them to open various chests throughout the dungeon!

name: Tenebyss

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: This may change later
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3070 / AMD RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard integrated sound card
  • Additional Notes: This may change later

short_description: Enter the world of Tenebyss, a dystopian gothic castles world that is flooded by thick mist and clouds. A world where Dark Souls and Risk Of Rain meet each other. Play alone or with friends, gather loot and prepare for your next dungeon!Customize your character and enchant your weapons.
